definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Andes mountain chain of South America

sentences.english: Sometimes, and not just in Andes, a destination is said to be so many cigarettes away.
sentences.chinese: 有时，不仅在安第斯山，人们会说某地在几枝烟之外。

sentences.english: Cordillera Azul stretches eastward from the foothills of the Andes.
sentences.chinese: Azul山从安第斯山的丘陵地带向东延伸。

sentences.english: This route is cut into the eastern side of the second highest mountain range on Earth, the Andes.
sentences.chinese: 这条路是在地球第二高山脉安第斯山的东侧修筑的。

sentences.english: The ranch is a base for pack trips high into the Andes.
sentences.chinese: 大农场是爬安第斯山的背包旅行的基地。

sentences.english: This female has learned an important lesson about surviving in the Andes.
sentences.chinese: 这头雌狮学会了在安第斯山生存的重要一课。

definition: Andes mountain chain of South America

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Cerro Aconcagua, mountain in the Americas

pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1
Ma3 da2 jia1 si1 jia1 Dao3

definition: Cordillera, series of mountain ranges stretching from Patagonia in South America through to Alaska and Aleutian islands
pinyin: Ke1 di2 le4 la1 shan1 xi4
